> ⚠️ **External pull requests are automatically closed.**
> OrbRunner is a solo-developed project. Only the core development team can merge code.
> If you have a bug report or feature idea, please [open an Issue](../../issues/new/choose) instead — there are templates ready for both.

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Refactor / cleanup
- [ ] Docs / CI only

## Checklist

- [ ] I have added an update log at `src/main/resources/update_logs/vX.X.md` and registered it in `index.txt`
- [ ] **If I added or changed game features, I have written tests for them** in `src/test/java/`
- [ ] All existing tests still pass (`./gradlew test`)
- [ ] My code follows the existing style of the project
